testcase.name: Validar criação de portabilidade
testcase.system-out: * def resultContract = callonce read('../../claroApp/user/contractlist.feature@list') . passed * header Authorization = 'Bearer ' + resultContract.idmtoken + '@' + resultContract.operatorcode + resultContract.contractnumber . passed * header X-Application-Key = gwappkey ..................................... passed * header Content-Type = 'application/json' ................................ passed * header origin = 'API' ................................................... passed * url portabilityUrl ...................................................... passed * def body = .............................................................. passed * def responseApi = ....................................................... passed Given path 'phone' ........................................................ passed And request body .......................................................... passed When method post .......................................................... passed Then status 200 ........................................................... passed And match response == responseApi ......................................... passed
